name: Avoid the cube 2
description:
!!!Avoid the cube 2 its her, and comes with a new guy on the group¡¡¡¡

Use a radar, hide in a box, survive and DON'T GET CAUGHT

in this new game of avoid the cube, you controll a sargent in a park, you must survive til the clock says 3 A.M.

special thanks to Ratatuiill, he recorded the voices and a bit of the audio

WARNING: when you download the game, your antivirus will activate and protect your pc, dont worry, its not a virus, itr just a poor game developed in clickteam fusion 2.5 without any license. download it ONLY if you trust me, if not, im sorry, hope you can try the game.

this game gives 1 piece to the story puzzle, so wait for the other games

maybe the game should change the name to Q-bes (cubes).

Don't forget to check our social medias

--PXL Group
